title: BRIEF-Bowler Metcalf Says Application Made For Cancellation, Delisting Of 2 Mln Shares
text:
BRIEF-Bowler Metcalf Says Application Made For Cancellation, Delisting Of 2 Mln Shares

Stock Markets 44 minutes ago (Oct 24, 2019 16:24)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Bowler Metcalf Says Application Made For Cancellation, Delisting Of 2 Mln Shares Oct 24 (Reuters) - Bowler Metcalf Ltd : * CANCELLATION AND DELISTING OF REPURCHASED SHARES * APPLICATION HAS BEEN MADE TO JSE LIMITED FOR CANCELLATION AND DELISTING OF 2 012 260 SHARES

BRIEF-Bowler Metcalf Says Application Made For Cancellation, Delisting Of 2 Mln Shares
